channel.title: I need help deciding a source
channel.description:
well after making serveral Private servers for friends i dedided to make a server Based on a few eary's wich are ment for Training and such. And 2Other earya's 1for pk and 1for clan wars.
I needet 3things for it. 1) A VPS (A deticed server my dads company hosts :D) --> Free lol, thanks dad :D 2) Allot of inspiration and a fellow coder -> Got this to. 3) A server source. -> I dont got this. Thats why i need you guys help.
This is what i am actually looking for: I am looking for a source that is pretty blank (meaning not to mutch extra's added) I dont want Summoning added I dont want to have ancients in a diferent tab then the magics tab. I dont want to have skills added. (I will make a unique skill methods) Castle Wars cannot be added.
The reason why i want it like that is to prevent laggs. My dediced host can handle all enough but i just want to make sure.
Can an1 Help me deciding wich source to use ?
Thanks in advance: ~Joery~

item.title: I need help deciding a source
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

if you want to be serious about it everyone says rs2dv is the shit around here. super stable and super blank. pretty much what you’re asking for.

rs2dv

Otherwise, get allstar and just remove all of the stuff on it. can’t be that hard.

Allstar V2

Read full topic
item.source: I need help deciding a source

Look for a server source in the Downloads Section OR, check google.com

item.description:
@J03RY wrote:

well after making serveral Private servers for friends i dedided to make a server
Based on a few eary’s wich are ment for Training and such.
And 2Other earya’s 1for pk and 1for clan wars.

I needet 3things for it.

  1. A VPS (A deticed server my dads company hosts :D) --> Free lol, thanks dad
  2. Allot of inspiration and a fellow coder -> Got this to.
  3. A server source. -> I dont got this.
    Thats why i need you guys help.

This is what i am actually looking for:
I am looking for a source that is pretty blank (meaning not to mutch extra’s added)
I dont want Summoning added
I dont want to have ancients in a diferent tab then the magics tab.
I dont want to have skills added. (I will make a unique skill methods)
Castle Wars cannot be added.

The reason why i want it like that is to prevent laggs.
My dediced host can handle all enough but i just want to make sure.

Can an1 Help me deciding wich source to use ?
